definitions.definition: That which is believed ; accepted doctrine , especially religious doctrine; a particular set of beliefs ; any summary of principles or opinions professed or adhered to.
A reading or statement of belief that summarizes the faith it represents; a confession of faith for public use, especially one which is brief and comprehensive .
examples: A creed is a manifesto of religious or spiritual beliefs

definitions.definition: The fact of believing ; belief, faith.

main_definition: That which is believed ; accepted doctrine , especially religious doctrine; a particular set of beliefs ; any summary of principles or opinions professed or adhered to.
secondary_definitions: ( specifically , religion ) A reading or statement of belief that summarizes the faith it represents; a confession of faith for public use, especially one which is brief and comprehensive .
( rare ) The fact of believing ; belief, faith.
